content:
SocketOptionLevel Enum

Definition

Defines socket option levels for the stem.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption* and stem.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption* methods.

In this Article

public enum SocketOptionLevel
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SocketOptionLevel

Remarks

The SocketOptionLevel enumeration defines the socket option levels that can be passed to the SetSocketOption and GetSocketOption methods. SocketOptionName enumerated values are grouped by SocketOptionLevel.

Note To use IPv6 on Windows XP, install Advance Networking Pack for Windows XP.

Fields

IP

Socket options apply only to IP sockets.
IPv6

Socket options apply only to IPv6 sockets.
Socket

Socket options apply to all sockets.
Tcp

Socket options apply only to TCP sockets.
Udp

Socket options apply only to UDP sockets.
